action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates the second Sunday in December 2006 as National Children's Memorial Day in conjunction with The Compassionate Friends Worldwide Candle Lighting. Expresses support for the efforts of The Compassionate Friends to assist and comfort families grieving the loss of a child.
